moods.quote: Let your smile change the world. Don't let the world change your smile.

musics.description: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.

engSeries.name: The Big Bang Theory
engSeries.description: Physicists Leonard and Sheldon find their nerd-centric social circle with pals Howard and Raj expanding when aspiring actress Penny moves in next door.

engSeries.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
engSeries.description: Brilliant but immature Brooklyn detective Jake Peralta must learn to follow the rules and be a team player when his squad gets an exacting new captain

engSeries.name: The Umbrella Academy
engSeries.description: Reunited by their father's death, estranged siblings with extraordinary powers uncover shocking family secrets -- and a looming threat to humanity.

engSeries.name: Lost in Space
engSeries.description: After crash-landing on an alien planet, the Robinson family fights against all odds to survive and escape. But they're surrounded by hidden dangers.

engSeries.name: Friends
engSeries.description: This hit sitcom follows the merry misadventures of six 20-something pals as they navigate the pitfalls of work, life and love in 1990s Manhattan.

When the West Beverly High hallways are flooded with trash by the opponent schoolteam, Dixon tries to impress his peers and prove them he is not the 'Principal's kid' by destroying the other school's cafeteria with 3 wild boars which belongs to Navid's dad, a pornographic movie producer

engSeries.name: Russian Doll
engSeries.description: Nadia keeps dying and reliving her 36th birthday party. She's trapped in a surreal time loop -- and staring down the barrel of her own mortality.

engSeries.name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
engSeries.description: The extraordinary Baudelaire orphans face trials, tribulations and the evil Count Olaf in their fateful quest to unlock long-held family secrets.

hinSeries.name: Delhi crime
hinSeries.description: As Delhi reels in the aftermath of a gang rape, DCP Vartika Chaturvedi leads a painstaking search for the culprits. Based on the 2012 Nirbhaya case.

hinSeries.name: Four More Shots Please!
hinSeries.description: Four unapologetically flawed women live, love, blunder and discover what really makes them tick through friendship and tequila in Millenial Mimbai.

hinSeries.name: Bacherlors
hinSeries.description: The series revolves around Four Bachelor Flatmates who in every episode will deal with a specific daily life bachelor related problem. It's about their battle against an external ‘X’ problem as a single team

hinSeries.name: Comicstaan
hinSeries.description: Comicstaan brings together seven og the biggest comedians in Indai, to find the next big name in stand-up.

hinSeries.name: Panchayat
hinSeries.description: Panchayat is a comedy-drama, which captures the journey of an engineering graduate Abhishek, who for lack of a better job option joins as secretary of a panchayat office ina a remote village of Uttar Pradesh.

korSeries.name: Descendants of the Sun
korSeries.description: After a chance meeting in a hospital, an ardent soldier falls for a gifted surgeon. Opposing philosophies tear them apart, but fate has other plans.

korSeries.name: Fight For My Way
korSeries.description: A former taekwondo champion and an information desk worker aspire to chase their dreams in a world that isn’t kind to those with mediocre credentials.

korSeries.name: Her Private Life
korSeries.description: An art curator's life unravels, as she tries to keep her pastime as a die-hard K-pop fan secret from her gallery's new director.

korSeries.name: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim
korSeries.description: A vainglorious executive who seemingly has everything faces devastating news when his adept personal assistant announces that she’s decided to quit.

korSeries.name: Hwarang
korSeries.description: An elite group of young warriors trained in morals and martial arts finds love and friendship in Silla during Korea’s ancient Three Kingdoms period.

korSeries.name: Kill Me Heal Me
korSeries.description: To be cured of his seven-personality dissociative identity disorder, a rich heir secretly enlists the help of a pretty psychiatric medical resident.

korSeries.name: It's Okay, That's Love
korSeries.description: Successful novelist and radio DJ Jae-yeol and psychiatrist Hae-soo are constantly at odds, but that changes when they start living in the same house.

engMovies.name: The Fast and The Furious
engMovies.description: The film opens with quite spectacular truck robbery and purely 'impossible' in real life. After a series of such cases, truck drivers start off great pressure on FBI. At all costs, they have to take steps to prevent these dangerous bandits and cheeky actions.

engMovies.name: What's Your Number
engMovies.description: A woman looks back at the past nineteen men she's had relationships with in her life and wonders if one of them might be her one true love.

engMovies.name: Pitch Perfect
engMovies.description: Pitch Perfect ( Also Known As: A Escolha Perfeita) is a Comedy, Music, Romance film directed by Jason Moore and written by Kay Cannon. It was released on 5 October 2012 (USA). It stars Anna Kendrick, Brittany Snow, Rebel Wilson. The film's content : Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group... What awaits ahead ? Enjoy the film and discover by yourself.

engMovies.name: Frozen
engMovies.description: Frozen revolves around a group of three people in horror days when going skiing in the mountains.When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister, Anna, teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

engMovies.name: The Chronicles of Narnia
engMovies.description: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe is a 2005 British-American high fantasy. It is the story of four kids travelling through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learning of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

engMovies.name: The Princess Switch
engMovies.description: When a down-to-earth Chicago baker and a soon-to-be princess discover they look like twins, they hatch a Christmastime plan to trade places.

engMovies.name: The Knight Before Christmas
engMovies.description: Medieval magic sends a 14th-century knight to modern-day Ohio, where he falls for a high school science teacher who's disillusioned by love.

engMovies.name: Godzilla
engMovies.description: Godzilla is produced by talented names, the most prominent of which director Gareth Edward and filmmaker Seamus Mc Garvey. With their talent, they have integrated physical and virtual elements, blend together, and make the story of Godzilla become close, honest and more frightening.

engMovies.name: Inside Out
engMovies.description: Inside Out film tells the story of a normal teenage girl Riley. Like other peers, entering puberty is the arduous process for Riley. She is challenged by the unexpected event when she is forced to bid farewell to her friends and current life in order to with her parents to live in the totally strange city.

engMovies.name: Work It
engMovies.description: A brilliant but clumsy high school senior vows to get into her late father’s alma mater by transforming herself and a misfit squad into dance champions.

engMovies.name: Vampires Suck
engMovies.description: Frank Crane, sheriff of Washington's Spork town, welcomes back his daughter Becca. However obvious the signs, she takes forever to recognize its Halloween-like decoration hardly masks the omnipresence of bizarrely clumsy vampires and werewolves, even in the case of her devoted youth friend Jacob White, whose canine traits extend from a tail to the irresistible urge to chase cats.

engMovies.name: Monte Carlo
engMovies.description: Monte Carlo revolves around 2 characters Grace and Emma'. After graduating, they spend time traveling to Paris. Things completely chang when Grace is mistaken for a famous British character - Cordelia Winthrop Scott ...

engMovies.name: The Holiday
engMovies.description: Iris and Amanda are two beautiful young women. They have one thing in common is not lucky in love. Because they know each other casually when joining a website and they agreed to exchange home for winter break in the hope to change the air and to ease the pain. But a new story begins when two men appear.

engMovies.name: Thor: Ragnarok
engMovies.description: Thor must race against time to prevent the all-powerful Hela from destroying his home and the Asgardian civilization. However, he must first win a deadly alien contest by defeating his former ally and fellow Avenger the Incredible Hulk!.

engMovies.name: Venom
engMovies.description: The movie is about journalist Eddie Brock, whose body merges with the alien Venom, leaving him with superhuman strength and power. Twisted, dark and fueled by rage, Venom tries to control the new and dangerous abilities that Eddie finds so intoxicating.

hinMovies.name: Good Newz
hinMovies.description: Two couples with the same surnames pursue in-vitro fertilization and wait for their upcoming babies. Trouble ensures when they find that the sperms of each couple have been mixed with each other.

hinMovies.name: PK
hinMovies.description: The film is a comedy revolving around the story of an alien guy named PK landing to Earth with a mission research but losing control of his spacecraft. He goes everywhere and does everything to find his control to return his planet.

hinMovies.name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
hinMovies.description: Three friends on an adventurous road trip/bachelor party in Spain learn some lessons about themselves and each other that will change them forever.

hinMovies.name: Yeh Jawaani hai Deewani
hinMovies.description: On a trekking trip, an introvert falls for a charming ex-classmate, whose thirst for adventure drives them apart. Years later, their paths cross again.

hinMovies.name: Kabir Singh
hinMovies.description: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.

punMovies.name: Chal Mera Putt
punMovies.description: A lighthearted comedy about grouup of illegal Punjabi immigrants living in the City of Birmingham trying to better their lives. Chal Mera Putt explores the struggle they face, the lasting friendships they make and the challenges they over come all whilst trying to get their PR.

punMovies.name: Guddiyan Patole
punMovies.description: When two sisters travel from Canada to Punjab to visit their maternal family, they discover an opportunity to mend a broken bond with their grandmother.

punMovies.name: Sufna
punMovies.description: Sufna, Dream, there is a saying that, 'dream is not, which you have while sleeping, dream is the one, which doesn't let you sleep. This is story about that kind of dream'. How a young man from very humble background achieve, what he aims for, and in this journey how a young girl from humble background only, become his back bone, become his strength and motivational source.

punMovies.name: Ambarsariya
punMovies.description: The movie tells the story of Jatt Ambarsariya alias Diljit Singh who lives dual life as a RAW agent and insurance agent.

punMovies.name: Carry on Jatta 2
punMovies.description: Jass, an orphan but a happy go lucky guy whose sole purpose in life is to go to Canada by any means possible succeeds in wooing Meet, an NRI. The comfusion begins to rise as Jass learns more about the particular qualities Meet wants in her future husband.

fourth.name: Memes
fourth.description: I have a joke for you but you won't get it coz you're too busy reading me this far you stupid!

fourth.name: Vines/ Funny Videos
fourth.description: There's difference between 'wines' and 'vines' but, how do I explain this to my parents.

moods.quote: For every minute you are angry, you lose 60 seconds of happiness.

engSeries.name: Friends
engSeries.description: This hit sitcom follows the merry misadventures of six 20-something pals as they navigate the pitfalls of work, life and love in 1990s Manhattan.

engSeries.name: Gilmore Girls
engSeries.description: Fiercely independent single mom Lorelai raises gifted, Ivy League-bound daughter Rory amid a continual stream of quick-witted repartee.

engSeries.name: The Royals
engSeries.description: Set in a modern-day English, The Royals follows the lives of a fictional British Royal family that inhabits a world of opulence and regal tradition- a world that also comes with a price tag of duty, destiny and intense public scrutiny.

engSeries.name: Elite
engSeries.description: When three working-class teens enroll in an exclusive private school in Spain, the clash between them and the wealthy students leads to murder.

engSeries.name: Boss Baby: Back in business
engSeries.description: The Boss Baby brings his big brother Tim to the office to teach him the art of business in this animated series sprung from the hit film.

engSeries.name: Space Force
engSeries.description: A four-star general begrudgingly teams up with an eccentric scientist to get the U.S. military's newest agency — Space Force — ready for lift-off.

engSeries.name: Rick and Morty
engSeries.description: Brilliant but boozy scientist Rick hijacks his fretful teenage grandson, Morty, for wild escapades in other worlds and alternate dimensions.

engSeries.name: Never Have I Ever
engSeries.description: After a traumatic year, an Indian-American teen just wants to spruce up her social status — but friends, family and feelings won’t make it easy on her.

hinSeries.name: The Family Man
hinSeries.description: The Family man is an edgy action-drama series, which tells the story of a middle-class man who works for a special cell of the National Investigation Agency.

hinSeries.name: Paatal Lok
hinSeries.description: A down and out cop leads the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a prime time journalist. The case turns out to be a devious maze where nothing is what it looks like.

hinSeries.name: Pitchers
hinSeries.description: Four guys quit their jobs to start their own company. Not as easy as it sounds.

hinSeries.name: The Forgotten Army- Azaadi Ke Liye
hinSeries.description: The Forgotten Army is a true epic war series about the Indian soldiers from the Azad Hind Fauj who marched 3,884 kms from Singapore to Delhi to free their country from the British.

korSeries.name: Fight for my Way
korSeries.description: A former taekwondo champion and an information desk worker aspire to chase their dreams in a world that isn’t kind to those with mediocre credentials.

korSeries.name: Gaurdian: The Lonely and Great God
korSeries.description: In his quest for a bride to break his immortal curse, a 939-year-old guardian of souls meets a grim reaper and a sprightly student with a tragic past.

korSeries.name: Descendadnts of the Sun
korSeries.description: After a chance meeting in a hospital, an ardent soldier falls for a gifted surgeon. Opposing philosophies tear them apart, but fate has other plans.

korSeries.name: What's wrong with Secretary Kim
korSeries.description: A vainglorious executive who seemingly has everything faces devastating news when his adept personal assistant announces that she’s decided to quit.

korSeries.name: Strong Girl Bong Soon
korSeries.description: Born with supernatural strength, Bong-soon fights evil and procures justice while getting tangled in a love triangle with her CEO boss and cop crush.

korSeries.name: Her Private Life
korSeries.description: An art curator's life unravels, as she tries to keep her pastime as a die-hard K-pop fan secret from her gallery's new director.

korSeries.name: She Was Pretty
korSeries.description: After a complete reversal of fortune and looks, childhood sweethearts reunite for the first time in 15 years as employees at a fashion magazine.

engMovies.name: Big hero 6
engMovies.description: Hiro Hamada is a 14-year-old robotics genius in the futuristic fictional city of San Fransokyo. Having graduated high school at 13, he now spends his time participating and betting on illegal bot fights.

engMovies.name: Deadpool
engMovies.description: Deadpool centres on Wade Wilson, a person with incurable cancer is becoming mutant experiment with super-speed resilient varieties Wolverine.

engMovies.name: Cars
engMovies.description: Cars is a 2006 American computer-animated comedy-adventure film following a hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen getting waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

engMovies.name: Ghostbusters
engMovies.description: The film is about a group of eccentric scientists to capture ghosts in New York. A skyscraper in bustling downtown inadvertently becomes the focus of evil's activities.

engMovies.name: Hancock
engMovies.description: Hancock is a 2008 American superhero comedy-drama film following Hancock, a superhero whose ill considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when one person he saves helps him improve his public image.

engMovies.name: Hotel Transylvania
engMovies.description: Hotel Transylvania owner Dracula pulls double duty as an overprotective dad when an unwelcome suitor shows interest in his teenage daughter.

engMovies.name: The Incredibles
engMovies.description: The Incredibles is about the superhero Parr family in which each person has a different power. Robert Parr- 'Mr. Incredible', has to abandon his career of helping people to do a insurance agent.

engMovies.name: Pixels
engMovies.description: When aliens intercept video feeds of classic arcade games and misinterpret them as a declaration of war, they attack Earth, using the games as models. Knowing that he must employ a similar strategy, President Will Cooper recruits his childhood pal.

engMovies.name: Rio
engMovies.description: Rio is the story of Blu’s adventure, a macaw bird of South America that is being cared for at a park in USA. When Blu comes to know that Jewel, another macaw, Blu left Minnesota for Rio de Janero, he leaves to find Jewel.

engMovies.name: Shazam!
engMovies.description: A boy is given the ability to become an adult superhero in times of need with a single magic word.

engMovies.name: Suicide Squad
engMovies.description: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

engMovies.name: Ted
engMovies.description: When I childhood wish of bringing his teddy bear to life come true, John Bennett must decide between the bear and his girlfriend, Lori. Hilarious comedy will have you laughing the whole way through.

engMovies.name: Dracula Untold
engMovies.description: In Dracula Untold, after the death of tyrant Vlad Tepes III, horror stories about him are still being circulated and is the inspiration for Bram Stoker to write the classic novel: 'Dracula'. This story has been successfully shown by Gary Oldman in 1992.

engMovies.name: Divergent
engMovies.description: In a futuristic dystopian Chicago, society is divided into five factions: Abnegation (the selfless), Amity (the peaceful), Candor (the honest), Dauntless (the brave), and Erudite (the intellectual). The remaining population are the Factionless, who have no status or privilege in this society.

engMovies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
engMovies.description: It is about a jet pilot is stranded in space, and he must unite a group of aliens to form an army which is capable of defeating the threat from space.

hinMovies.name: Gully Boy
hinMovies.description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of the street rappers of Mumbai.

hinMovies.name: Sultan
hinMovies.description: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

hinMovies.name: Badla
hinMovies.description: When a woman is accused of killing her lover, a renowned lawyer is hired, but the more they try to untangle the truth, the more convoluted it becomes.

hinMovies.name: Dangal
hinMovies.description: A once-promising wrestler pursues the gold medal he never won by training two of his daughters to compete at the Commonwealth Games.

hinMovies.name: Commando 2
hinMovies.description: The story revolves around commando Karanveer who is on a mission to nab Vicky Chaddha, the most wanted black money laundering agent. Karanveer, with three other Indian officers, travels to Malaysia to track black money.

punMovies.name: Yaar Annmulle
punMovies.description: A story of three college students who are studying and staying together while exploring new friendships and various aspects of love.

punMovies.name: Sardaar Ji 2
punMovies.description: From being chased by the goons to kidnapping a bride, a farmer exiled in Australia must face it all in order to save his village.

punMovies.name: Vadhayiyaan Ji Vadhayiyaan
punMovies.description: Pragat who is about to get married soon loses his eyesight the morning after a night of drunken celebrations. will Prgat be able to hide his temporary blindness from Gagan and marry her or will this put a damper on their wedding?

punMovies.name: Jatt & Juliet
punMovies.description: Stark opposites, Fateh Singh and Pooja reach Canada with dreams in their eyes. They cross paths and sparks fly. However, life has a different plan for them.

punMovies.name: Nikka Zaildar 3
punMovies.description: The film chronicles the story of Nikka whose father's soul enters his body following his death.

fourth.name: Yoga
fourth.description: The body benefits from movement, and benefits from stillness.

fourth.name: Zumba
fourth.description: Zumba class rule: Don't know a move? Just shake it 'till you make it'.

fourth.name: Workout
fourth.description: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.

moods.quote: Bored of being bored because being bored is boring.

musics.description: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.

musics.name: Hindi
musics.description: Music is the moonlight in the gloomy night of life.

musics.name: Punjabi

engSeries.name: Money Heist
engSeries.description: Eight thieves take hostages and lock themselves in the Royal Mint of Spain as a criminal mastermind manipulates the police to carry out his plan.

engSeries.name: Stranger Things
engSeries.description: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

engSeries.name: Black Mirror
engSeries.description: This sci-fi anthology series explores a twisted, high-tech near-future where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

engSeries.name: Game of Thrones
engSeries.description: The show tells the story of seven clans fighting to master the mythical land of Westeros. In the show, the dominant clan's Houses Stark, Lannister, Baratheon, and King of Westeros, Robert Baratheon, demand his old friend Eddard- the lord Stark high office, Eddard reluctantly accepts command to find out the truth behind it. Meanwhile, the family of the Queen, Lannisters, perhaps are contemplating ploy to deprive of power. On the other side of the sea, the last member of the clan is deposed former dominion, Targaryens, are also arranged plans to regain the throne. Also at the North Pole, White Shadow - demons capital so long asleep, awake now.

engSeries.name: Dark
engSeries.description: A missing child sets four families on a frantic hunt for answers as they unearth a mind-bending mystery that spans three generations.

engSeries.name: Silicon Valley
engSeries.description: In this comedy cocreated by Mike Judge, computer whizzes toil away at a tech company in California hoping their ideas will be the Next Big Thing. One of these is Richard (Thomas Middleditch), a shy but brilliant programmer whose potentially gazillion-dollar compression algorithm piques the interest of two rival industry titans: Gavin Belson (Matt Ross), the Machiavellian honcho of Hooli ready to gobble up - or destroy - any and all competition; and Peter Gregory (Christopher Evan Welch), an eccentric recluse with, perhaps, more dollars than sense.

engSeries.name: Doctor Who
engSeries.description: Adventures in time and space with the ninth doctor and his companion Rose.

engSeries.name: Dexter
engSeries.description: When blood spatter analyst Dexter Morgan is not out solving murders, he spends his time as a serial kiler who eliminates those who do bad things.

hinSeries.name: Mirzapur
hinSeries.description: The iron-fisted Akhandanand Tripathi is a millionaire carpet exporter and the mafia don of Mirzapur. His son, Munna, is an unworthy, power hungry heir who will stop at nothing to inherit his father's legacy. An incident at a wedding procession forces him to cross paths with Raamakant Pandit, an upstanding lawyer, and his sons, Guddu anf Bablu.

hinSeries.name: Sacred Games
hinSeries.description: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

hinSeries.name: Paatal Lok
hinSeries.description: A down and out cop leads the case of a lifetime when four suspects are nabbed in the assassination attempt of a prime time journalist. The case turns out to be a devious maze where nothing is what it looks like. The pursuit of it leads him to the dark netherworld- the 'Patal Lok', and to shocking discoveries in the past of the four suspects.

hinSeries.name: Inmates
hinSeries.description: Meet the Inmates: Madhav, Fooga, Rahul, Kay and Richa.5 Friends. 1 Madhouse. TVF's crazy new web series coming your way.

hinSeries.name: Mind The Malhotras
hinSeries.description: When yet another married couple within their friend circle files for divorce, Rishabh and Shefali Malhotra fear that their marriage can too be a ticking time bomb.

korSeries.name: The King: Eternal Monarch
korSeries.description: A modern-day Korean emperor passes through a mysterious portal and into a parallel world, where he encounters a feisty police detective.

korSeries.name: Itaewon Class
korSeries.description: In a colorful Seoul neighborhood, an ex-con and his friends fight a mighty foe to make their ambitious dreams for their street bar a reality.

korSeries.name: The K2
korSeries.description: A fugitive soldier gets swept up in personal and political intrigue when he's hired as a bodyguard for the family of a presidential candidate.

korSeries.name: Another Miss Oh
korSeries.description: A sound director who suddenly starts getting visions of someone else’s future gets mired in the lives of two women, who happen to share the same name.

korSeries.name: The Last Empress
korSeries.description: In a modern-day monarchical Korea, a bright musical actress enters an unforgiving world of sinister secrets when she marries the emperor.

korSeries.name: Healer
korSeries.description: A star reporter, a second-rate journalist and a man by the code name 'Healer' are brought together by a long-buried incident that hides dark truths

korSeries.name: Her Private Life
korSeries.description: An art curator's life unravels, as she tries to keep her pastime as a die-hard K-pop fan secret from her gallery's new director.

engMovies.name: Knock Knock
engMovies.description: Two nubile, stranded womenreveal a sinister agenda after they spend the night with a married architect .

engMovies.name: Orphan
engMovies.description: Orphan revolves around the life of the family of John and Kate couples. Because of miscarriage, Kate and John, especially Kate becomes depressed and obsessed with terrible nightmares. With the efforts to find a normal life, they decide to adopt. At the local orphanage, both John and Kate are attracted by Esther. However, as soon as Esther comes to their home, a series of strange events occur, causing Kate to believe that there's something wrong with Esther, that she is not as simple as what she represents.

engMovies.name: The Tourist
engMovies.description: After breaking up with his girlfriend, the American scientist Frank decides to travel to Venice. In this city, Frank meets a beautiful girl named Elise an Interpol agent - who had dragged him into the case that she is in charge.

engMovies.name: John Wick
engMovies.description: John Wick is a dramatic action film directed by Chad Stahelski. The film revolves around the character John Wick a former assassin. In retaliation for the stolen car and the death of his loyal dog, John Wick does not hesitate to against Viggo - who worked with him in the past.

engMovies.name: Now You See Me
engMovies.description: Now You See Me is about a magician team led by talented leader Atlas, performs two magic repertoires extremely impressive. The first is robbing money of a bank in Paris while they're in Las Vegas, then is exposing criminal and transfer the entire millions of dollars amount in his account to all the viewers are watching, that makes the authorities give up.

engMovies.name: Lucy
engMovies.description: Lucy is kidnapped girl and involves in a transport mysterious item mission of a criminal organization. The incident happened to turn her into a super combatant with the ability far beyond the knowledge of ordinary people.

engMovies.name: The Conjuring
engMovies.description: Set in 1971, The conjuring tells the story of Ed and Lorraine Warren who specializes in investigating supernatural phenomena well known in the 20th century. A family is constantly haunted and traumatized by a specter of horror, the family asks for help from the couple Warren.

engMovies.name: The Lord Of The Rings
engMovies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle Earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

engMovies.name: Divergent
engMovies.description: In a futuristic dystopian Chicago, society is divided into five factions: Abnegation (the selfless), Amity (the peaceful), Candor (the honest), Dauntless (the brave), and Erudite (the intellectual). The remaining population are the Factionless, who have no status or privilege in this society.

engMovies.name: The Final Destination 4
engMovies.description: While enjoying a day at the track, Nick OBannon has a horrific premonition of his friends and him all dying in a freak accident involving many racecars. Mere seconds before the vision comes true, he manages to convince them to leave. Although they cheat death then, the survivors each begin to meet a grisly end, and Nick tries to figure a way to escape a similar fate.

engMovies.name: Interstellar
engMovies.description: Interstellar directed Christopher Nolan who is famous for making science fiction genre. His most successful films are The Dark Night and Inception. This time his new film with the participation of many famous names in Hollywood as Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Bill Irwin, Ellen Burstyn, Michael Caine star...

engMovies.name: Ready Player One
engMovies.description: In 2045, when the creator of a virtual reality world called the OASIS dies, he releases a video in which he challenges all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune.

engMovies.name: The Old Guard
engMovies.description: A covert team of immortal mercenaries are suddenly exposed and must now fight to keep their identity a secret just as an unexpected new member is discovered.

engMovies.name: Ender's Game
engMovies.description: Ender's game tells a story about Young Ender Wiggin, who recruited by the International Military to lead the fight against the Formics, a genocidal alien race which nearly annihilated the human race in a previous invasion.

engMovies.name: Friends with Benefits
engMovies.description: Jamie is a New York-based executive recruiter who entices Dylan, an art director from Los Angeles, to take a job at the New York office of GQ magazine. Finding that they have much in common, the two become fast friends. Feeling jaded by a number of broken romances, Dylan and Jamie decide that they are ready to quit looking for true love and focus on having fun. However, complications unfold when the two best pals add sex to their relationship.

hinMovies.name: Raazi
hinMovies.description: Set in 1971, when the winds of war were blowing between India and Pakistan, Raazi, an adaptation of Harinder Sikka's novel 'Calling Sehmat', is a true life story involving a 20 year old Kashmiri girl.

hinMovies.name: Sultan
hinMovies.description: Sultan is a classic underdog tale about a wrestler's journey, looking for a comeback by defeating all odds.

hinMovies.name: The Ghazi Attack
hinMovies.description: Inspired by true events, The Ghazi Attack is India's first underwater war film. The story revolves around the events that unfolded right before the Indo-Pakistan war of 1971, when the Pakistani Submarine Ghazi attempted to destroy the Indian aircraft carrier Vikrant.

hinMovies.name: Gold
hinMovies.description: Set in 1948, the historical story of India's first Olympic medal posts their independence.

hinMovies.name: Pari
hinMovies.description: Pari is a supernatural horror film, where a man attempts to help a woman named Ruksana, an abuse victim, who he found chained up in a hut.

punMovies.name: Guddiyan Patole
punMovies.description: When two sisters travel from Canada to Punjab to visit their maternal family, they discover an opportunity to mend a broken bond with their grandmother.

punMovies.name: Nikka Zaildar 3
punMovies.description: The film chronicles the story of Nikka whose father's soul enters his body following his death.

punMovies.name: Shadaa
punMovies.description: Admist pressures from his parents to hurry up and wed, a young man seeks his perfect match. after many failed attempts with matchmakers, his parents are delighted when their son finaaly meets the woman of his dreams but things do not go as planned.

punMovies.name: Chandigarh Amritsar Chandigarh
punMovies.description: A gorl from Chandigarh who comes to Amritsar with the intention of rejecting a prospective groom but ends up spending the day with a complete stranger.

punMovies.name: Carry On Jatta 2
punMovies.description: It revolves around the confusing and comic events that arise after Jass lies to Mahie about his family in order to marry her.

moods.quote: Each morning we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.

musics.name: English
musics.description: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.

musics.name: Hindi
musics.description: Music is the moonlight in the gloomy night of life.

musics.name: Punjabi
musics.description: Music that touches us emotionally, where words alone can’t.

musics.name: Mix and Match
musics.description: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.

engSeries.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
engSeries.description: Brilliant but immature Brooklyn detective Jake Peralta must learn to follow the rules and be a team player when his squad gets an exacting new captain.

engSeries.name: Breaking Bad
engSeries.description: A terminally ill chemistry teacher teams with a former student to manufacture crystal meth to secure his family's future.

When the West Beverly High hallways are flooded with trash by the opponent schoolteam, Dixon tries to impress his peers and prove them he is not the 'Principal's kid' by destroying the other school's cafeteria with 3 wild boars which belongs to Navid's dad, a pornographic movie producer.

engSeries.name: Sherlock
engSeries.description: In this updated take on Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's beloved mystery tales, the eccentric sleuth prowls the streets of modern London in search of clues.

engSeries.name: One-Punch Man
engSeries.description: The most powerful superhero in the world can kill anyone with one blow. But nothing can challenge him, so he struggles with ennui and depression.

engSeries.name: The Big Bang Theory
engSeries.description: Physicists Leonard and Sheldon find their nerd-centric social circle with pals Howard and Raj expanding when aspiring actress Penny moves in next door.

engSeries.name: Suite life of Zack and Cody
engSeries.description: The Suite Life of Zack and Cody - Season 1 is a Comedy, Family TV Series whose creators are Danny Kallis, Jim Geoghan. It was released on 18 Mar. 2005. It stars Cole Sprouse, Dylan Sprouse, Brenda Song. The season begins with :When Zack and Cody want to make friends, they meet Max and Tapeworm. After the 'Drew Crew' finds out where they live, they suddenly want to hang out with the twins...What await ahead?

engSeries.name: The Office
engSeries.description: In this first season of The Office, Dunder Miffin Regional Manager Michael Scott leads the documentary team and his staff on a journey through inappropriate behaviour, well-intentional but misguided comments and a myriad of poor management techniques.

hinSeries.name: The Family Man
hinSeries.description: The Family man is an edgy action-drama series, which tells the story of a middle-class man who works for a special cell of the National Investigation Agency. While he tries to protect the nation from terrorists, he also has to protect his family from the impact of his secretive, high-pressure, and low paying job.

hinSeries.name: Asur
hinSeries.description: A unique crime thriller that pits two opposing worlds against each other. The less explored, intricate world of forensic science and the deep mysticism of ancient Indian Mythology.

hinSeries.name: Delhi crime
hinSeries.description: As Delhi reels in the aftermath of a gang rape, DCP Vartika Chaturvedi leads a painstaking search for the culprits. Based on the 2012 Nirbhaya case.

hinSeries.name: Hostel Daze
hinSeries.description: Four wingmates, one Hostel, fisrt semester. 'Hostel Daze' tries to capture the hostel-culture (or its lack thereof) of an engineering college.

hinSeries.name: Comicstaan
hinSeries.description: Comicstaan brings together seven og the biggest comedians in Indai, to find the next big name in stand-up.

korSeries.name: Strong Girl Bong-Soon
korSeries.description: Born with supernatural strength, Bong-soon fights evil and procures justice while getting tangled in a love triangle with her CEO boss and cop crush.

korSeries.name: Fight for my way
korSeries.description: A former taekwondo champion and an information desk worker aspire to chase their dreams in a world that isn’t kind to those with mediocre credentials.

korSeries.name: School 2017
korSeries.description: The popular series is back, as students contend with new problems and learn life lessons while dealing with the pressures of growing up.

korSeries.name: Hotel Del Luna
korSeries.description: When he's invited to manage a hotel for dead souls, an elite hotelier gets to know the establishment's ancient owner and her strange world.

korSeries.name: Oh My Venus
korSeries.description: Dumped by her boyfriend of 15 years for gaining weight, a lawyer gets help from a hotshot personal trainer to get in shape and turn her life around.

korSeries.name: Love in the Moonlight
korSeries.description: A young Joseon woman who's lived her whole life as a man ends up as a eunuch in the royal palace, where she begins to bond with the crown prince.

korSeries.name: Cinderella and the Four Knights
korSeries.description: Catching the eye of a wealthy gentleman, spunky Ha-won gets hired to live with his three immature grandsons so she can whip them into shape.

engMovies.name: Miss Congeniality
engMovies.description: From director Donald Petrie, this action comedy stars award-winning actress Sandra Bullock as an FBI agent who goes undercover as a beauty contestant to thwart the efforts of a terrorist threatening to blow up the Miss USA Pageant.

engMovies.name: Divergent
engMovies.description: In a futuristic dystopian Chicago, society is divided into five factions: Abnegation (the selfless), Amity (the peaceful), Candor (the honest), Dauntless (the brave), and Erudite (the intellectual). The remaining population are the Factionless, who have no status or privilege in this society.

engMovies.name: Pirates Of The Caribbean 3
engMovies.description: To save the pirates out of extinct Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, find Jack Sparrow, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

engMovies.name: We Are Your Friends
engMovies.description: In this music drama, Zac Efron stars as Cole Carter, a San Fernando youngster caught between dreams of making tracks that will set the world on fire and being an adult with responsibilities and stuff. All of this changes when he meets a charismatic but damaged older DJ named James, whose young sister seems to be the one for Cole..

engMovies.name: The Boss Baby
engMovies.description: Meet the most unusual baby, known only as 'Baby', who wears a suit, speaks with the voice and wit of Alec Baldwin, as he teams up with is seven-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.

engMovies.name: Birds of Prey
engMovies.description: After splitting with the Joker, Harley Quinn joins superheroes Black Canary, Huntress and Renee Montoya to save a young girl from an evil crime lord.

engMovies.name: Gravity
engMovies.description: Gravity (Also Known As: Cuoc Chien Khong Trong Luc ) is an Adventure, Drama, Sci-Fi film directed by Alfonso Cuarón and written by Jonás Cuarón. It was released on 11 October 2013. It stars Sandra Bullock, George Clooney, Ed Harris. The film's content : A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space... What awaits ahead ? Enjoy the film and discover by yourself.

engMovies.name: Bad Boys for Life
engMovies.description: The Bad Boys Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett are back together for one last ride in the highly anticipated Bad Boys for Life

engMovies.name: Iron Man
engMovies.description: Tony Stark is an owner of a technology group, and a weird playboy. In the inspecting Afghanistan, he was kidnapped by a terrorist group. They demanded Tony creating weapons of mass destruction to attack America. Realize the reality that these weapons he is manufactured against himself, Tony begins manufacturing high-tech armor. Escape from the detention, Tony became the representative of justice under the nickname Iron Man. Meanwhile, fellow in the group attempting to overthrow him.

engMovies.name: Aquaman
engMovies.description: Jason Momoa stars as Arthur Curry, the heir to the underwater kingdom of Atlantis, who must step forward to lead his people and be a hero to the world.

engMovies.name: Back To The Future
engMovies.description: Back To The Future (Also Known As: Volver al futuro ) is an Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi film directed by Robert Zemeckis and written by Bob Gale. It was released on 3 July 1985 (USA). It stars Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson. The film's content : Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.... What awaits ahead ? Enjoy the film and discover by yourself.

engMovies.name: Black Panther
engMovies.description: After the death of his father, T'Challa returns home to the African nation of Wakanda to take his rightful place as king. However, when an old enemy reappears on the radar, T'Challa's mettle as King and Black Panther is tested when he is drawn into a conflict that puts the entire fate of Wakanda and the world at risk.

engMovies.name: Pacific Rim
engMovies.description: A compelling film tells about the fierce battle between humans and giant creatures known as kaiju rising from the sea. They break everything they meet on the ground. The battle lasts for many years and takes away the lives of many people. The Military school has crafted a giant robot - Jeager..

engMovies.name: The Holiday
engMovies.description: Iris and Amanda are two beautiful young women. They have one thing in common is not lucky in love. Because they know each other casually when joining a website and they agreed to exchange home for winter break in the hope to change the air and to ease the pain. But a new story begins when two men appear.

engMovies.name: Ratatouille
engMovies.description: A rat named Remy dreams of becoming a great French chef despite his family's wishes and the obvious problem of being a rat in a decidedly rodent-phobic profession. When fate places Remy in the sewers of Paris, he finds himself ideally situated beneath a restaurant made famous by his culinary hero, Auguste Gusteau. Despite the apparent dangers of being an unlikely - and certainly unwanted - visitor in the kitchen of a fine French restaurant, Remy's passion for cooking soon sets into motion a hilarious and exciting rat race that turns the culinary world of Paris upside down.

hinMovies.name: Judwaa 2
hinMovies.description: Separated at birth, twins Raja and Prem are same same but different. They unite as adults to take on the smuggling mafia and their similar looks add to the confusion.

hinMovies.name: Queen
hinMovies.description: Dumped by her fiancé, a sheltered young woman decides to go on her honeymoon to Europe alone, embarking on an exhilarating journey of self-discovery.

hinMovies.name: Sui Dhaaga- Made In India
hinMovies.description: 'Sui Dhaaga- Made in India' is a heart-warming story of pride and self-reliance. Through Mauji and his wife Mamta, the film talks about the need of entrepreneurship as a tool for social and economic development of out artisans. Set ina a small town in India, it is the journey of an honest man from a humble background, who pursues his passion, overcoming all odds.

hinMovies.name: Street Dancer 3D
hinMovies.description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street dancers.

hinMovies.name: Good Newwz
hinMovies.description: Two couples with the same surnames pursue in-vitro fertilization and wait for their upcoming babies. Trouble ensues when they find that the sperms of each couple have been switched.

punMovies.name: Soorma
punMovies.description: This biopic on former Indian field hockey player Sandeep Singh follows the athlete’s hard-fought comeback after an accidental gunshot left him paralyzed.

punMovies.name: Jatt & Juliet 2
punMovies.description: Eyeing a promotion, a police constable from Punjab lands in Canada in search of the Deputy Commissioner's daughter. Things get messy when cupid's arrow strikes at work.

punMovies.name: Shadaa
punMovies.description: Admist pressures from his parents to hurry up and wed, a young man seeks his perfect match. after many failed attempts with matchmakers, his parents are delighted when their son finaaly meets the woman of his dreams but things do not go as planned.

punMovies.name: Manje Bistre
punMovies.description: While prepping for a family wedding, a young man falls for his sister’s friend, who has already been promised to someone else.

punMovies.name: Laung Laachi
punMovies.description: Anewly married couple decide to live together as strangers but the husband tries to win her by love.

fourth.name: Get Inspired
fourth.description: I am not here to be average, I am here to be awesome.

fourth.name: Stand-Up
fourth.description: When has stand-up comedy been kind to anyone? It goes after anyone who's the target. Comedy attacks, man!

moods.quote: It's no longer YOU and I, it somehow became WE.

musics.name: English
musics.description: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.

musics.name: Hindi
musics.description: Music is the moonlight in the gloomy night of life.

musics.name: Punjabi
musics.description: Music that touches us emotionally, where words alone can’t.

musics.name: Mix and Match
musics.description: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.

engSeries.name: The Vampire Diaries
engSeries.description: Trapped in adolescent bodies, feuding vampire brothers Stefan and Damon vie for the affection of captivating teenager Elena.

engSeries.name: Gossip Girl
engSeries.description: A group of hyperprivileged Manhattan private-school kids seem to get away with everything. Except an anonymous blogger is watching their every move.

engSeries.name: Upload
engSeries.description: A man is able to choose his own afterlife after his untimely death by having his consciousness uploaded into a virtual world. As he gets used to his new life and befriends his angel (real world handler) questions about his death arise.

engSeries.name: Modern Love
engSeries.description: TV series based on the New York Times' column that explores relationships, love and the human connection.

engSeries.name: Grey's Anatomy
engSeries.description: The medical drama follows the personal and professional lives of the doctors at Seattle's Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital.

engSeries.name: Never Have I Ever
engSeries.description: After a traumatic year, an Indian-American teen just wants to spruce up her social status — but friends, family and feelings won’t make it easy on her.

When the West Beverly High hallways are flooded with trash by the opponent schoolteam, Dixon tries to impress his peers and prove them he is not the 'Principal's kid' by destroying the other school's cafeteria with 3 wild boars which belongs to Navid's dad, a pornographic movie producer.

engSeries.name: Skulls and Roses
engSeries.description: Couples compete against each other on Skull Island, testing their instincts for love and self-preservation.

hinSeries.name: Little things
hinSeries.description: A cohabiting couple in their 20s navigate the ups and downs of work, modern-day relationships and finding themselves in contemporary Mumbai.

hinSeries.name: Permanent Roommates
hinSeries.description: Mikesh and Tanya, who were in a long distance relationship for 3 years, finally face the prospect of getting married.

hinSeries.name: Made in Heaven
hinSeries.description: Made in Heaven chronicles the lives of Tara and Karan, two wedding planners in Delhi. India is apotent blend of old and new, hence, tradition jostles with modern aspirations.

hinSeries.name: Bandish Bandits
hinSeries.description: Radhe a singing prodigy from a classical background & Tamanna, a pop sensation on the rise meet, and Radhe's world is turned upside down when he falls in love with her.

hinSeries.name: College Romance
hinSeries.description: College Romance is all about #YaarPyaarAurBakchodi.

korSeries.name: My Secret Romance
korSeries.description: A nutritionist gets entangled in a series of misunderstandings with her new chaebol boss -- who turns out to be someone she slept with in the past.

korSeries.name: Pinocchio
korSeries.description: In-ha and Ha-myeong become reporters for different reasons: one aspires to follow in her mother’s footsteps and the other seeks to do honest news.

korSeries.name: The Legend of the Blue Sea
korSeries.description: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

korSeries.name: Cinderella and the Four Knights
korSeries.description: Catching the eye of a wealthy gentleman, spunky Ha-won gets hired to live with his three immature grandsons so she can whip them into shape.

korSeries.name: My love from Another Star
korSeries.description: An alien who came to Earth 400 years ago is almost able to return to his own planet, but when he meets a famous actress, he doesn't want to go home.

korSeries.name: Tempted
korSeries.description: Love is just a game for a chaebol heir who agrees to a petty bet with his friends to seduce a college student — until he starts to fall for her.

korSeries.name: Lie to Me
korSeries.description: A spunky Ministry of Culture official gets caught in a web of lies when she claims she's married a wealthy and handsome hotel manager.

engMovies.name: Twilight
engMovies.description: The drama begins when the beautiful girl Bella Swan and her parents moved to the town of Forks. The beauty of Bella makes a lot of boys miserable. However, she is particularly sympathetic to the boys quite mysterious Edward Cullen, can Bella discover the shocking secret of Edward?

engMovies.name: No Strings Attached
engMovies.description: No Strings Attached is a Comedy, Romance film directed by Ivan Reitman and written by Elizabeth Meriwether. It was released on 11 February 2011 (Vietnam). It stars Natalie Portman, Ashton Kutcher, Kevin Kline. The film's content : A guy and girl try to keep their relationship strictly physical, but it's not long before they learn that they want something more... What awaits ahead?

engMovies.name: 17 Again
engMovies.description: Mike O'Donnell is on top of the world: he's the star of his high school basketball team, is a shoo-in for a college scholarship, and is dating his soul-mate, Scarlet. But at what's supposed to be his big game where a college scout is checking him out, Scarlet reveals that she's pregnant.

engMovies.name: The Kissing Booth
engMovies.description: When a pretty, late-bloomer's first kiss leads to a forbidden romance with the hottest boy in high school, she risks her relationship with her best friend.

engMovies.name: Life as We Know It
engMovies.description: Life As We Know It opens with the dating of Holly , owns a small bakery and Eric Messer, a technician of sports channels. They meet under the matchmaker's two best friends - Alison and Peter. It seemingly romantic but quickly becomes the worst dating of Holly and Messer that they want to forget.

engMovies.name: Remember Me
engMovies.description: This film shows a romantic drama centered on two new lovers: Tyler, whose parents have split in the wake of his brother's suicide, and Ally, who lives each day to the fullest since witnessing her mother's murder.

engMovies.name: To All the Boys I've Loved Before
engMovies.description: A teenage girl's secret love letters are exposed and her life is soon thrown into chaos when her foregoing loves confront her one by one.

engMovies.name: The Ugly Truth
engMovies.description: Abby is a manufacturer of television programs in California. She is the type who sexy, successful but 'lonely' in love. She always sets herself high standards. The men in her imagination is 'intelligent, handsome, and successful...'

engMovies.name: The Notebook
engMovies.description: The Notebook revolves around the love story of a young couple - Allie Hamilton and Noah Calhoun. They meet at a festival but because of Noah's poor family circumstance, Allie's parents object to this and take Allie away to prevent two people from loving. After years of waiting, Allie meets and gets engaged to a young soldier named Lon...

engMovies.name: Passengers
engMovies.description: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

engMovies.name: The Perfect Date
engMovies.description: To earn money for college, a high schooler launches an app offering his services as a fake date. But when real feelings emerge, things get complicated.

engMovies.name: Made of Honor
engMovies.description: Tom and Hannah have been platonic friends for 10 years. He's a serial dater, while she wants marriage but hasn't found Mr. Right. Just as Tom is starting to think that he is relationship material after all, Hannah gets engaged. When she asks Tom to be her 'maid' of honor, he reluctantly agrees just so he can attempt to stop the wedding and woo her.

engMovies.name: The Holiday
engMovies.description: Iris and Amanda are two beautiful young women. They have one thing in common is not lucky in love. Because they know each other casually when joining a website and they agreed to exchange home for winter break in the hope to change the air and to ease the pain. But a new story begins when two men appear.

engMovies.name: Titanic
engMovies.description: Titanic is a famous romantic film. This film is about the love story of Rose Dewitt Bukater and Jack Dawson. Jack was a free-spirited poor young man but he got a ticket for a luxurious ship, Titanic. Rose was from the American upper class and was engaged to a man. She was reluctant to marry him. She met Jack in Titanic and they fell deeply in love even there was a huge gap between them.

engMovies.name: Failure to Launch
engMovies.description: A overgrown mama's boy who hasn't found the courage to take flight from the nest gets a little help from the girl of his dreams in the one comedy that proves it's never to late to strike out on your own. Tripp (Matthew McConaughey) may have hit 30, but that doesn't mean that he's ready to give up the many benefits of living at home with mom (Kathy Bates) and dad (Terry Bradshaw).

hinMovies.name: Badrinath Ki Dulhania
hinMovies.description: Badrinath Ki Dulhania is a story of Badrinath Bansal from Jhansi and Vaidehi Trivedi from Kota and what happens when the two of them meet. Even though they are from small towns, their mindset is diametrical opposite about gender roles in society. This leads to a clash of ideologies, despite both of them recoganizing the goodness in each other.

hinMovies.name: Sonu ke Titu ki Sweety
hinMovies.description: Titu is going to marry a perfect woman named Sweety. Titu's best-friend Sonu doubts Sweety's character and tries to break the marriage while Sweety tries to do opposite and which leads to war between Bromance and Romance.

hinMovies.name: Kabir Singh
hinMovies.description: An exalted but short-fused surgeon plunges into a spiral of drugs, alcohol and rage after his intense relationship with his girlfriend turbulently ends.

hinMovies.name: Malang
hinMovies.description: Years after a police encounter separates him from his lover, an angry young man goes on a killing spree, with an equally vengeful cop on his heels.

hinMovies.name: Love aaj Kal
hinMovies.description: When professional ambitions clash with personal feelings for a modern-day couple, a love story from a bygone decade may offer some wisdom.

punMovies.name: Sufna
punMovies.description: Jeet is a free-spirited youth in the village, he doesn't care or has not any goal in the life. But his life changes, when he meets Teg, a beautiful young girl from another village.

punMovies.name: Muklawa
punMovies.description: The film is based on the after the wedding custom when a newly-wed bride is taken back to her husband's home for the first time. Set against the backdrop of the pre-partitioned era.

punMovies.name: Guddiyan Patole
punMovies.description: When two sisters travel from Canada to Punjab to visit their maternal family, they discover an opportunity to mend a broken bond with their grandmother.

punMovies.name: Qismat
punMovies.description: A young villager moves to Chandigarh and falls for his bubbly neighbor, but their love story is affected by several heartbreaking twists of fate.

punMovies.name: Sardaar Ji 2
punMovies.description: From being chased by the goons to kidnapping a bride, a farmer exiled in Australia must face it all in order to save his village.

fourth.name: Love Overload
fourth.description: With the whole world crumbling, we pick this time to fall in love.

fourth.name: Cuteness Overload
fourth.description: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than he loves himself.

moods.quote: Trust yourself. You've survived a lot and you will survive whatever is coming.

musics.description: Music is the wine that fills the cup of silence.

musics.name: Hindi
musics.description: Music is the moonlight in the gloomy night of life.

musics.name: Punjabi
musics.description: Music that touches us emotionally, where words alone can’t.

musics.name: Mix and Match
musics.description: Music is the divine way to tell beautiful, poetic things to the heart.

engSeries.name: Two and a Half Men
engSeries.description: Bachelor Charlie's womanizing ways are hindered when his divorced brother, Alan, moves into his Malibu pad with his wisecracking young son, Jake.

engSeries.name: How to Sell Drugs Online (Fast)
engSeries.description: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a nerdy teen starts selling ecstasy online out of his bedroom -- and becomes one of Europe's biggest dealers.

engSeries.name: The Boys
engSeries.description: In a world where superheroes embrace the darkside of their massive celebrity and fame, The Boys centres ona group of vigilantes known informally as 'The boys', who set out to take dpwn corrupt superheroes with no more thatn their blue collar grit and willingness to fight dirty.

engSeries.name: The Walking Dead
engSeries.description: In the wake of a zombie apocalypse, survivors hold on to the hope of humanity by banding together to wage a fight for their own survival.

engSeries.name: Gilmore Girls
engSeries.description: Fiercely independent single mom Lorelai raises gifted, Ivy League-bound daughter Rory amid a continual stream of quick-witted repartee.

engSeries.name: Dead to Me
engSeries.description: A hotheaded widow searching for the hit-and-run driver who mowed down her husband befriends an eccentric optimist who isn't quite what she seems.

engSeries.name: Young Sheldon
engSeries.description: For 9-year-old Sheldon Cooper it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. Being a once-in-a-generation mind capable of advanced mathematics and science isn't always helpful ina a land where church and football are king. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naive Sheldon deals with the world, his very normal family must find a way to deal with him.

engSeries.name: The Flash
engSeries.description: Nine months after being hit by lightning, Barry Allen awakens and he discovers that he has a special ability: speed up the body and move super fast. Since there, the myth of the hero Flash has started.

hinSeries.name: Asur
hinSeries.description: A unique crime thriller that pits two opposing worlds against each other. The less explored, intricate world of forensic science and the deep mysticism of ancient Indian Mythology.

hinSeries.name: Bacherlors
hinSeries.description: The series revolves around Four Bachelor Flatmates who in every episode will deal with a specific daily life bachelor related problem. It's about their battle against an external ‘X’ problem as a single team.

hinSeries.name: Kota Factory
hinSeries.description: Kota Factory captures the life of IIT and Medical exam aspirants as they face both Competition and Life.

hinSeries.name: Special Ops
hinSeries.description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a teror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a nineteen-year long manhunt.

hinSeries.name: Hostages
hinSeries.description: Reneging on the deal to kill the CM, Prithvi plans to smuggle him to nepal but ends up in a hostage crisis again. Amid threats old and new, a conspiring unfolds.

korSeries.name: Hotel Del Luna
korSeries.description: When he's invited to manage a hotel for dead souls, an elite hotelier gets to know the establishment's ancient owner and her strange world.

korSeries.name: The King: Eternal Monarch
korSeries.description: A modern-day Korean emperor passes through a mysterious portal and into a parallel world, where he encounters a feisty police detective.

korSeries.name: Crash Landing on You
korSeries.description: A paragliding mishap drops a South Korean heiress in North Korea -- and into the life of an army officer, who decides he will help her hide.

korSeries.name: Wok of Love
korSeries.description: Down on his luck and in need of a kitchen, a star chef turns to reforming a shoddy Chinese restaurant staffed by former gangsters.

korSeries.name: Oh My Ghost
korSeries.description: Possessed by the ghost of a lustful virgin, a timid assistant chef becomes confidently libidinous, drawing the attention of a haughty culinary star.

korSeries.name: Descendants of the Sun
korSeries.description: After a chance meeting in a hospital, an ardent soldier falls for a gifted surgeon. Opposing philosophies tear them apart, but fate has other plans.

korSeries.name: Weightlifting Fairy Kim Bok Joo
korSeries.description: A competitive swimmer crosses paths with his childhood friend, a rising weight lifting star, and realizes that she has a secret crush on his cousin.

engMovies.name: The Fast and The Furious
engMovies.description: The film opens with quite spectacular truck robbery and purely 'impossible' in real life. After a series of such cases, truck drivers start off great pressure on FBI. At all costs, they have to take steps to prevent these dangerous bandits and cheeky actions.

engMovies.name: Step Up 3D
engMovies.description: A tight-knit group of New York City street dancers find themselves pitted against the world's best hip hop dancers in a high-stakes showdown.

engMovies.name: Harry Potter And The Sorcerer's Stone
engMovies.description: Harry Potter, the boy orphaned by both parents living under the stairs agony aunt and uncle. He neither knew he had miraculously escaped death as soon as he was born nor know about his witch blood. Harry's life changes abruptly when Hagrid, protector of Hogwarts comes to pick him to witch world ... A new world opens up to Harry, there is both exciting and dangerous things, good and bad guys...

engMovies.name: Passengers
engMovies.description: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

engMovies.name: Bad Neighbours
engMovies.description: The film revolves around the story of a young couple with a daughter, they live happily in the house and only when necessary, they go out of the house. Their lives is increasingly tasteless until they meet a new neighbor- a young active and disruptive student.

engMovies.name: Bolt
engMovies.description: Bolt, an American white shepherd, has lived his whole life on the set of his action TV show, where he believes he has superpowers. When separated from the studio by accident, he meets a female alley cat named Mittens and a hamster named Rhino. He's trying to find the way home, to the studio. Along the way, he learns that he doesn't have superpowers and that the show is not real.

engMovies.name: Gemini Man
engMovies.description: Henry Brogen, an aging assassin tries to get out of the business but finds himself in the ultimate battle: fighting his own clone who is 25 years younger than him and at the peak of his abilities.

engMovies.name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
engMovies.description: Aim at searching for the missing grandfather, Sean Anderson decides to set off a trip to the island where the old man supposed to be lost. With the help of his stepfather, Sean has such an adventure and discovers several mysterious things.

engMovies.name: Independence Day
engMovies.description: In the beginning of July, humans received a strange signal, and this has turned into a global phenomenon. A massive spaceship headed towards Earth and smaller spaceships began to cover entire cities around the world. Suddenly, the wonder turns into horror as the spaceships destroy the cities with energy weapons. Then when the world counterattacked, the alien ships are invincible to military weapons. Then the President of the United States decides to head to Area 51, to formulate a plan to defeat the aliens. Now the fate of the world rests on a handful of surviving humans.

engMovies.name: Barely Lethal
engMovies.description: The film revolves around a 16-year-old female assassin. Because of wanting to have a normal life,he conducted his fake death and returned to a secondary school, but soon realized that the school environment has more challenges than secret mission...

engMovies.name: Knives Out
engMovies.description: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.

engMovies.name: Men In Black
engMovies.description: Men In Black tells about the activities of one organization specializing in the management and monitoring of aliens on Earth- Men In Black. Accidentally witnessing an alien, Men in Black finds themselves in the middle of the deadly terrorist plot which is arriving on Earth to assassinate two ambassadors against the galaxy...

engMovies.name: Work It
engMovies.description: When Quinn Ackerman's admission to the college of her dreams depends on her performance at a dance competition, she forms a ragtag group of dancers to take on the best squad in school...now she just needs to learn how to dance.

engMovies.name: Kung Fu Panda
engMovies.description: Kung Fu Panda, known as a 3D animated film by DreamWorks founded by John Stevenson and Mark Osborne, produced by Melissa Cobb. The film is about a panda likes learning kung fu martial arts but his father doesn'agree because he is forced to footsteps to sell wheat of his father. And on one occasion...

engMovies.name: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
engMovies.description: The game has changed, but the legend continues. The movie follows four high school kids who are transported into the video game world of Jumanji, and, playing as the characters they chose. There, they must beat the game in order to return to the real world.

hinMovies.name: Gangs of Wasseypur
hinMovies.description: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood fued spanning three generations.

hinMovies.name: Toilet: Ek Prem Katha
hinMovies.description: On her first day of marriage, a woman leaves her husband upon learning his home lacks a toilet, sparking a quixotic quest to acquire modern sanitation.

hinMovies.name: Gully Boy
hinMovies.description: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

hinMovies.name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
hinMovies.description: Pawan, a devoted follower of Lord Hanuman, gaces numerous challenges when he tries to reunite Munni with her family after she gets lost while travelling back home with her mother.

hinMovies.name: Hindi Medium
hinMovies.description: A couple wants to give their daughter the best education so she will be accepted by the elite school.

punMovies.name: Doorbeen
punMovies.description: Shinda, a small time crook, lives in Punjab and invents new ways too smuggle liquor inside the territory while trying to win the love of his life.

punMovies.name: Sardaar ji
punMovies.description: When a palatial wedding venue turns out to be haunted, one of the families hosting the wedding hires a fearless Sikh to deal with the ghost.

punMovies.name: Yaar Annmulle
punMovies.description: A story of three college students who are studying and staying together while exploring new friendships and various aspects of love.

punMovies.name: Muklawa
punMovies.description: The film is based on the after the wedding custom when a newly-wed bride is taken back to her husband's home for the first time. Set against the backdrop of the pre-partitioned era.

punMovies.name: Chal Mera Putt
punMovies.description: A lighthead comedy about a group of illegal Punjabi immigrants living in the City of Brimingham trying to better their lives. Chal Mera Putt explores the struggle they face, the lasting friendships they make and the challenge they over come all whilst trying to get their PR.

fourth.name: Meditate and Relax
fourth.description: Quiet the mind and the soul will speak.

fourth.name: Read Novels
fourth.description: That's the thing about novels. They let you travel without moving your feet.
